answers.answer: At my practice they only do the 3 hour because so many women fail the 1 hr test.

I failed my one hour...I opted out of the three hour and am monitoring my sugars 4x a day. She'll evaluate my numbers on my next appt. I just starting being really careful with my diet and portions. Going to control it with just eating well! :-) good luck! :-)

question: I took my glucose test Monday and my doctor called me up today saying my sugar level was high so next week I gotta return and do the 3 hour testing.  Does anybody have experience with this? Could it be possible I don't have diabetes even though my sugar level was high?
title: gestational diabetes
